typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		SOURCE_KEY as string,
		WS_EXT_PH_NAME as string,
		WS_EXT_PH_PART_NUM as string,
		LAST_NAME as string,
		FIRST_NAME as string,
		MIDDLE_NAME as string,
		WS_EXT_PH_BRTH_DATE as date,
		WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L1 as string,
		WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L2 as string,
		WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L3 as string,
		WS_EXT_PH_CITY as string,
		WS_EXT_PH_STATE as string,
		WS_EXT_PH_ZIP as string,
		ZIP_CODE5 as string,
		WS_EXT_PH_OMNI_VERSION as string,
		CHANGE_CODE as string,
		BATCH_ID as string,
		COUNTRY_CODE as string,
		WS_EXT_PH_STAT as string,
		PERSON_CHECK_SUM as string,
		PERADDR_CHECK_SUM as string,
		PERSONIDENT_CHECK_SUM as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: '\nSELECT SOURCE_KEY,WS_EXT_PH_NAME, WS_EXT_PH_PART_NUM, LAST_NAME,\nCASE WHEN CHARINDEX(\' \',FIRST_NAME) > 0 THEN trim(SUBSTRING(FIRST_NAME,1,CHARINDEX(\' \',FIRST_NAME))) ELSE FIRST_NAME END AS FIRST_NAME,\nCASE WHEN CHARINDEX(\' \',FIRST_NAME) > 0 THEN trim(SUBSTRING(FIRST_NAME,CHARINDEX(\' \',FIRST_NAME),LEN(FIRST_NAME))) ELSE NULL END AS MIDDLE_NAME,\nWS_EXT_PH_BRTH_DATE,WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L1,WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L2,WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L3,WS_EXT_PH_CITY,WS_EXT_PH_STATE,WS_EXT_PH_ZIP,ZIP_CODE5,WS_EXT_PH_OMNI_VERSION,CHANGE_CODE,BATCH_ID,\nCOUNTRY_CODE,WS_EXT_PH_STAT,PERSON_CHECK_SUM,PERADDR_CHECK_SUM,PERSONIDENT_CHECK_SUM\nFROM (\nSELECT  A.SOURCE_KEY,A.WS_EXT_PH_PART_NUM,UPPER(A.WS_EXT_PH_NAME) WS_EXT_PH_NAME, \nCASE WHEN A.ws_ext_ph_name like \'%,%\' THEN UPPER(trim(SUBSTRING(A.ws_ext_ph_name,1,(CHARINDEX(\',\',A.ws_ext_ph_name)-1))))\nELSE UPPER(A.WS_EXT_PH_NAME) END AS LAST_NAME,\nCASE WHEN A.ws_ext_ph_name like \'%,%\' THEN UPPER(trim(SUBSTRING(A.ws_ext_ph_name,CHARINDEX(\',\',A.ws_ext_ph_name)+1,LEN(A.ws_ext_ph_name)))) \nELSE NULL END AS FIRST_NAME,\nCAST(A.WS_EXT_PH_BRTH_DATE as date) as WS_EXT_PH_BRTH_DATE, CASE WHEN UPPER(ISNULL(A.WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L1,\'\'))= \'\' THEN NULL ELSE WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L1 END AS WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L1 , CASE WHEN UPPER(ISNULL(A.WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L2,\'\'))= \'\' THEN NULL ELSE WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L2 END AS WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L2 ,CASE WHEN UPPER(ISNULL(A.WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L3,\'\'))= \'\' THEN NULL ELSE WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L3 END AS WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L3 ,\nCASE WHEN UPPER(ISNULL(A.WS_EXT_PH_CITY,\'\'))= \'\' THEN NULL ELSE WS_EXT_PH_CITY END AS WS_EXT_PH_CITY, CASE WHEN UPPER(A.WS_EXT_PH_STATE)=\'\' THEN NULL ELSE WS_EXT_PH_STATE END AS WS_EXT_PH_STATE ,\nCASE WHEN UPPER(A.WS_EXT_PH_ZIP)=\'\' THEN NULL ELSE WS_EXT_PH_ZIP END AS WS_EXT_PH_ZIP ,CASE WHEN SUBSTRING(A.WS_EXT_PH_ZIP,1,5)=\'\' THEN NULL ELSE SUBSTRING(A.WS_EXT_PH_ZIP,1,5) END AS ZIP_CODE5, UPPER(A.WS_EXT_PH_OMNI_VERSION) WS_EXT_PH_OMNI_VERSION,UPPER(A.CHANGE_CODE) CHANGE_CODE,UPPER(B.COUNTRY_CODE) COUNTRY_CODE,UPPER(A.WS_EXT_PH_STAT) WS_EXT_PH_STAT,\nCONVERT(NVARCHAR(32),HashBytes(\'MD5\',ISNULL(WS_EXT_PH_NAME,\'1\')+ISNULL(WS_EXT_PH_PART_NUM,\'2\')+ISNULL(WS_EXT_PH_BRTH_DATE,\'3\')+ISNULL(WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L1,\'4\')+ISNULL(WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L2,\'5\')+\nISNULL(WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L3,\'6\')+ISNULL(WS_EXT_PH_CITY,\'7\')+ISNULL(WS_EXT_PH_STATE,\'8\')+ISNULL(WS_EXT_PH_ZIP,\'9\')+ISNULL(WS_EXT_PH_STAT,\'10\')    ),2) PERSON_CHECK_SUM,\nCONVERT(NVARCHAR(32),HashBytes(\'MD5\',ISNULL(WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L1,\'4\')+ISNULL(WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L2,\'5\')+ISNULL(WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L3,\'6\')+ISNULL(WS_EXT_PH_CITY,\'7\')+ISNULL(WS_EXT_PH_STATE,\'8\')+ISNULL(WS_EXT_PH_ZIP,\'9\')),2) PERADDR_CHECK_SUM, batch_id,\nCONVERT(NVARCHAR(32),HashBytes(\'MD5\',ISNULL(WS_EXT_PH_PART_NUM,\'2\')),2) PERSONIDENT_CHECK_SUM\nFROM CMDM_STAGE.RS_OMNI_VIPS_DAILY_PART_HEADER_DELTA_STG A LEFT JOIN \nCMDM_STAGE.STATE_MASTER B ON UPPER(TRIM(A.WS_EXT_PH_STATE)) = UPPER(TRIM(B.STATE_CODE))\n) T',
	format: 'query') ~> source1Person
source(output(
		prefix as string,
		FullName as string,
		firstName as string,
		middleName as string,
		lastName as string,
		suffix as string,
		gender as string,
		birthdate as date,
		birthPlace as string,
		srcPkey as string,
		sourceSystem as string,
		SSN as string,
		ITIN as string,
		driverLicense as string,
		primaryEmail as string,
		primeryPhone as string,
		streetAddress as string,
		primaryAddrLine1 as string,
		primaryAddrLine2 as string,
		primaryAddrLine3 as string,
		primaryAddrCity as string,
		primaryAddrState as string,
		primaryAddrPostalCode as string,
		countryCD as string,
		countyName as string,
		PostalCode5 as string,
		SourceDeletedInd as string,
		SourceStatus as string,
		row_status as string,
		batch_id as string,
		check_sum as string,
		createDateTime as timestamp,
		createdBy as string,
		lastUpdateDateTime as timestamp,
		lastUpdatedBy as string,
		SourceCreateDateTime as timestamp,
		SourceLastUpdateDateTime as timestamp,
		maritalStatus as string,
		SAMPLE_DATA_IND as integer,
		deathDate as date,
		PSEUDO_MDM_ID as string,
		SALESFORCE_CONTACT_ID as string,
		SOURCE_SYSTEM_UNDERLYING as string,
		PARTY_TYPE as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select * from [CMDM_STAGE].[Person] where sourceSystem=\'OMNI 7.1\' or sourceSystem = \'VIPS 5.2\'\n',
	format: 'query') ~> TgtPerson100
source(output(
		prefix as string,
		FullName as string,
		firstName as string,
		middleName as string,
		lastName as string,
		suffix as string,
		gender as string,
		birthdate as date,
		birthPlace as string,
		srcPkey as string,
		sourceSystem as string,
		SSN as string,
		ITIN as string,
		driverLicense as string,
		primaryEmail as string,
		primeryPhone as string,
		streetAddress as string,
		primaryAddrLine1 as string,
		primaryAddrLine2 as string,
		primaryAddrLine3 as string,
		primaryAddrCity as string,
		primaryAddrState as string,
		primaryAddrPostalCode as string,
		countryCD as string,
		countyName as string,
		PostalCode5 as string,
		SourceDeletedInd as string,
		SourceStatus as string,
		row_status as string,
		batch_id as string,
		check_sum as string,
		createDateTime as timestamp,
		createdBy as string,
		lastUpdateDateTime as timestamp,
		lastUpdatedBy as string,
		SourceCreateDateTime as timestamp,
		SourceLastUpdateDateTime as timestamp,
		maritalStatus as string,
		SAMPLE_DATA_IND as integer,
		deathDate as date,
		PSEUDO_MDM_ID as string,
		SALESFORCE_CONTACT_ID as string,
		SOURCE_SYSTEM_UNDERLYING as string,
		PARTY_TYPE as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select * from [CMDM_STAGE].[person] where sourceSystem=\'OMNI 7.1\' or sourceSystem = \'VIPS 5.2\'\n',
	format: 'query') ~> Tgtperson2
source(output(
		prefix as string,
		FullName as string,
		firstName as string,
		middleName as string,
		lastName as string,
		suffix as string,
		gender as string,
		birthdate as date,
		birthPlace as string,
		srcPkey as string,
		sourceSystem as string,
		SSN as string,
		ITIN as string,
		driverLicense as string,
		primaryEmail as string,
		primeryPhone as string,
		streetAddress as string,
		primaryAddrLine1 as string,
		primaryAddrLine2 as string,
		primaryAddrLine3 as string,
		primaryAddrCity as string,
		primaryAddrState as string,
		primaryAddrPostalCode as string,
		countryCD as string,
		countyName as string,
		PostalCode5 as string,
		SourceDeletedInd as string,
		SourceStatus as string,
		row_status as string,
		batch_id as string,
		check_sum as string,
		createDateTime as timestamp,
		createdBy as string,
		lastUpdateDateTime as timestamp,
		lastUpdatedBy as string,
		SourceCreateDateTime as timestamp,
		SourceLastUpdateDateTime as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select * from [CMDM_STAGE].[person] where sourceSystem=\'OMNI 7.1\' or sourceSystem = \'VIPS 5.2\'\n',
	format: 'query') ~> TgtPerson3
SourceDeleteInd derive(SourceCreateDateTime = 'NULL',
		SourceLastUpdateDateTime = 'NULL',
		row_status = 'A',
		Lastupdatetime = currentTimestamp(),
		createdBy = 'MYV_OMNI_STG_TO_COMMON_CREATE_LOAD',
		lastupdatedBy = 'MYV_OMNI_STG_TO_COMMON_CREATE_LOAD',
		createdatatime = currentTimestamp()) ~> derivedColumn1
notexists4 derive(SourceDeletedInd = 'N') ~> SourceDeleteInd
derivedColumn1 alterRow(insertIf(true())) ~> Insert
exists2 split(CHANGE_CODE=='UPDATE'||CHANGE_CODE=='NEW',
	CHANGE_CODE=='NEW',
	disjoint: true) ~> split3@(ifNeworUpdate, elsenew)
split3@ifNeworUpdate, TgtPerson100 exists(PERSON_CHECK_SUM == check_sum
&& row_status=='A',
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> doesntexists1
exists6 derive(Row_Status = 'I',
		LastUpdatedTime = currentTimestamp(),
		updatedBy = 'MYV_OMNI_STG_TO_COMMON_UPDT_LOAD') ~> derivedColumn2
derivedColumn2 alterRow(updateIf(true())) ~> updated
split5@if1, TgtPerson100 exists(SOURCE_KEY==srcPkey && WS_EXT_PH_OMNI_VERSION==sourceSystem && row_status=='A',
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> exists2
doesntexists1 split(CHANGE_CODE=='NEW'||CHANGE_CODE=='UPDATE',
	CHANGE_CODE=='NEW'||CHANGE_CODE=='UPDATE',
	disjoint: true) ~> split4@(updateI, InsertA)
split4@InsertA derive(SrcDelInd = case(CHANGE_CODE=='DELETE', 'Y','N'),
		RowStatus = 'A',
		LastUpdated_Time = currentTimestamp(),
		lastupdatedby = 'MYV_OMNI_STG_TO_COMMON_UPDT_LOAD',
		createdatetime = currentTimestamp(),
		createdby = 'MYV_OMNI_STG_TO_COMMON_CREATE_LOAD',
		sourcecreatedatetime = 'NULL',
		sourcelastupdatedatetime = 'NULL') ~> derivedColumn3
derivedColumn3 alterRow(insertIf(true())) ~> insert1
source1Person split(CHANGE_CODE=='NEW'||CHANGE_CODE=='UPDATE',
	CHANGE_CODE=='NEW',
	CHANGE_CODE=='DELETE',
	disjoint: true) ~> split5@(if1, if2, if3)
split5@if2, TgtPerson100 exists((SOURCE_KEY == srcPkey && WS_EXT_PH_OMNI_VERSION==sourceSystem && row_status == 'A'),
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> notexists4
TgtPerson100, split4@updateI exists(SOURCE_KEY == srcPkey && WS_EXT_PH_OMNI_VERSION==sourceSystem && row_status == 'A',
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> exists6
Tgtperson2, split5@if3 exists(SOURCE_KEY == srcPkey && WS_EXT_PH_OMNI_VERSION==sourceSystem && row_status == 'A',
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> exists7
exists7 derive(Srcinddel = 'Y',
		LastUpdatedTm = currentTimestamp(),
		lastupdatedby = 'MYV_OMNI_STG_TO_COMMON_UPDT_LOAD') ~> derivedColumn5
derivedColumn5 alterRow(updateIf(true())) ~> deleteupdate
TgtPerson3, split3@elsenew exists(check_sum == PERSON_CHECK_SUM
&& row_status=='A',
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> exists8
exists8 derive(batchidd = '4',
		lastupdttime = currentTimestamp(),
		srcdlind = 'N') ~> derivedColumn6
derivedColumn6 alterRow(updateIf(true())) ~> updatetrue
Insert sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		prefix as string,
		FullName as string,
		firstName as string,
		middleName as string,
		lastName as string,
		suffix as string,
		gender as string,
		birthdate as date,
		birthPlace as string,
		srcPkey as string,
		sourceSystem as string,
		SSN as string,
		ITIN as string,
		driverLicense as string,
		primaryEmail as string,
		primeryPhone as string,
		streetAddress as string,
		primaryAddrLine1 as string,
		primaryAddrLine2 as string,
		primaryAddrLine3 as string,
		primaryAddrCity as string,
		primaryAddrState as string,
		primaryAddrPostalCode as string,
		countryCD as string,
		countyName as string,
		PostalCode5 as string,
		SourceDeletedInd as string,
		SourceStatus as string,
		row_status as string,
		batch_id as string,
		check_sum as string,
		createDateTime as timestamp,
		createdBy as string,
		lastUpdateDateTime as timestamp,
		lastUpdatedBy as string,
		SourceCreateDateTime as timestamp,
		SourceLastUpdateDateTime as timestamp
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 5,
	errorHandlingOption: 'allErrors',
	outputRejectedData: true,
	rejectedData_fileSystem: 'rejectedrecs',
	rejectedData_folderPath: 'dataflow_error_logs',
	transactionCommit: 'single',
	reportSuccessOnError: true,
	mapColumn(
		firstName = FIRST_NAME,
		middleName = MIDDLE_NAME,
		lastName = LAST_NAME,
		FullName = WS_EXT_PH_NAME,
		birthdate = WS_EXT_PH_BRTH_DATE,
		srcPkey = SOURCE_KEY,
		sourceSystem = WS_EXT_PH_OMNI_VERSION,
		SSN = WS_EXT_PH_PART_NUM,
		primaryAddrLine1 = WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L1,
		primaryAddrLine2 = WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L2,
		primaryAddrLine3 = WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L3,
		primaryAddrCity = WS_EXT_PH_CITY,
		primaryAddrState = WS_EXT_PH_STATE,
		primaryAddrPostalCode = WS_EXT_PH_ZIP,
		countryCD = COUNTRY_CODE,
		PostalCode5 = ZIP_CODE5,
		SourceDeletedInd,
		SourceStatus = WS_EXT_PH_STAT,
		row_status,
		batch_id = BATCH_ID,
		check_sum = PERSON_CHECK_SUM,
		lastUpdateDateTime = Lastupdatetime,
		SourceCreateDateTime,
		SourceLastUpdateDateTime,
		createdBy,
		lastUpdatedBy = lastupdatedBy,
		createDateTime = createdatatime
	)) ~> PersonInsert
updated sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		prefix as string,
		FullName as string,
		firstName as string,
		middleName as string,
		lastName as string,
		suffix as string,
		gender as string,
		birthdate as date,
		birthPlace as string,
		srcPkey as string,
		sourceSystem as string,
		SSN as string,
		ITIN as string,
		driverLicense as string,
		primaryEmail as string,
		primeryPhone as string,
		streetAddress as string,
		primaryAddrLine1 as string,
		primaryAddrLine2 as string,
		primaryAddrLine3 as string,
		primaryAddrCity as string,
		primaryAddrState as string,
		primaryAddrPostalCode as string,
		countryCD as string,
		countyName as string,
		PostalCode5 as string,
		SourceDeletedInd as string,
		SourceStatus as string,
		row_status as string,
		batch_id as string,
		check_sum as string,
		createDateTime as timestamp,
		createdBy as string,
		lastUpdateDateTime as timestamp,
		lastUpdatedBy as string,
		SourceCreateDateTime as timestamp,
		SourceLastUpdateDateTime as timestamp
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['srcPkey','batch_id'],
	skipKeyWrites:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 2,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		prefix,
		FullName,
		firstName,
		middleName,
		lastName,
		suffix,
		gender,
		birthdate,
		birthPlace,
		srcPkey,
		sourceSystem,
		SSN,
		ITIN,
		driverLicense,
		primaryEmail,
		primeryPhone,
		streetAddress,
		primaryAddrLine1,
		primaryAddrLine2,
		primaryAddrLine3,
		primaryAddrCity,
		primaryAddrState,
		primaryAddrPostalCode,
		countryCD,
		countyName,
		PostalCode5,
		SourceDeletedInd,
		SourceStatus,
		row_status = derivedColumn2@Row_Status,
		batch_id,
		check_sum,
		createDateTime,
		createdBy,
		lastUpdateDateTime,
		lastUpdatedBy = updatedBy,
		SourceCreateDateTime,
		SourceLastUpdateDateTime
	)) ~> personUpdate
insert1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		prefix as string,
		FullName as string,
		firstName as string,
		middleName as string,
		lastName as string,
		suffix as string,
		gender as string,
		birthdate as date,

		primaryAddrCity as string,
		primaryAddrState as string,
		primaryAddrPostalCode as string,
		countryCD as string,

		PostalCode5 as string,
		SourceDeletedInd as string,
		SourceStatus as string,
		row_status as string,
		batch_id as string,
		check_sum as string,
		createDateTime as timestamp,
		createdBy as string,
		lastUpdateDateTime as timestamp,
		lastUpdatedBy as string,
		SourceCreateDateTime as timestamp,
		SourceLastUpdateDateTime as timestamp
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 3,
	errorHandlingOption: 'allErrors',
	transactionCommit: 'single',
	reportSuccessOnError: false,
	mapColumn(
		FullName = WS_EXT_PH_NAME,
		firstName = FIRST_NAME,
		middleName = MIDDLE_NAME,
		lastName = LAST_NAME,
		birthdate = WS_EXT_PH_BRTH_DATE,
		srcPkey = SOURCE_KEY,
		sourceSystem = WS_EXT_PH_OMNI_VERSION,
		SSN = WS_EXT_PH_PART_NUM,
		primaryAddrLine1 = WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L1,
		primaryAddrLine2 = WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L2,
		primaryAddrLine3 = WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L3,
		primaryAddrCity = WS_EXT_PH_CITY,
		primaryAddrState = WS_EXT_PH_STATE,
		primaryAddrPostalCode = WS_EXT_PH_ZIP,
		countryCD = COUNTRY_CODE,
		PostalCode5 = ZIP_CODE5,
		SourceDeletedInd = SrcDelInd,
		SourceStatus = WS_EXT_PH_STAT,
		row_status = RowStatus,
		batch_id = BATCH_ID,
		check_sum = PERSON_CHECK_SUM,
		createDateTime = createdatetime,
		createdBy = createdby,
		lastUpdateDateTime = LastUpdated_Time,
		lastUpdatedBy = lastupdatedby,
		SourceCreateDateTime = sourcecreatedatetime,
		SourceLastUpdateDateTime = sourcelastupdatedatetime
	)) ~> personinsert1
deleteupdate sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		prefix as string,
		FullName as string,
		firstName as string,
		middleName as string,
		lastName as string,
		suffix as string,
		gender as string,
		birthdate as date,
		birthPlace as string,
		srcPkey as string,
		sourceSystem as string,
		SSN as string,
		ITIN as string,
		driverLicense as string,
		primaryEmail as string,
		primeryPhone as string,
		streetAddress as string,
		primaryAddrLine1 as string,
		primaryAddrLine2 as string,
		primaryAddrLine3 as string,
		primaryAddrCity as string,
		primaryAddrState as string,
		primaryAddrPostalCode as string,
		countryCD as string,
		countyName as string,
		PostalCode5 as string,
		SourceDeletedInd as string,
		SourceStatus as string,
		row_status as string,
		batch_id as string,
		check_sum as string,
		createDateTime as timestamp,
		createdBy as string,
		lastUpdateDateTime as timestamp,
		lastUpdatedBy as string,
		SourceCreateDateTime as timestamp,
		SourceLastUpdateDateTime as timestamp
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['srcPkey','batch_id'],
	skipKeyWrites:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 4,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		prefix,
		FullName,
		firstName,
		middleName,
		lastName,
		suffix,
		gender,
		birthdate,
		birthPlace,
		srcPkey,
		sourceSystem,
		SSN,
		ITIN,
		driverLicense,
		primaryEmail,
		primeryPhone,
		streetAddress,
		primaryAddrLine1,
		primaryAddrLine2,
		primaryAddrLine3,
		primaryAddrCity,
		primaryAddrState,
		primaryAddrPostalCode,
		countryCD,
		countyName,
		PostalCode5,
		SourceDeletedInd = Srcinddel,
		SourceStatus,
		row_status,
		batch_id,
		check_sum,
		createDateTime,
		createdBy,
		lastUpdateDateTime = LastUpdatedTm,
		lastUpdatedBy = derivedColumn5@lastupdatedby,
		SourceCreateDateTime,
		SourceLastUpdateDateTime
	)) ~> persondelete
updatetrue sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		prefix as string,
		FullName as string,
		firstName as string,
		middleName as string,
		lastName as string,
		suffix as string,
		gender as string,
		birthdate as date,
		birthPlace as string,
		srcPkey as string,
		sourceSystem as string,
		SSN as string,
		ITIN as string,
		driverLicense as string,
		primaryEmail as string,
		primeryPhone as string,
		streetAddress as string,
		primaryAddrLine1 as string,
		primaryAddrLine2 as string,
		primaryAddrLine3 as string,
		primaryAddrCity as string,
		primaryAddrState as string,
		primaryAddrPostalCode as string,
		countryCD as string,
		countyName as string,
		PostalCode5 as string,
		SourceDeletedInd as string,
		SourceStatus as string,
		row_status as string,
		batch_id as string,
		check_sum as string,
		createDateTime as timestamp,
		createdBy as string,
		lastUpdateDateTime as timestamp,
		lastUpdatedBy as string,
		SourceCreateDateTime as timestamp,
		SourceLastUpdateDateTime as timestamp
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['srcPkey','row_status'],
	skipKeyWrites:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		prefix,
		FullName,
		firstName,
		middleName,
		lastName,
		suffix,
		gender,
		birthdate,
		birthPlace,
		srcPkey,
		sourceSystem,
		SSN,
		ITIN,
		driverLicense,
		primaryEmail,
		primeryPhone,
		streetAddress,
		primaryAddrLine1,

		primaryAddrLine3,
		primaryAddrCity,
		primaryAddrState,
		primaryAddrPostalCode,
		countryCD,
		countyName,
		PostalCode5,
		SourceDeletedInd = srcdlind,
		SourceStatus,
		row_status,
		batch_id = batchidd,
		check_sum,
		createDateTime,
		createdBy,
		lastUpdateDateTime = lastupdttime,
		lastUpdatedBy,
		SourceCreateDateTime,
		SourceLastUpdateDateTime
	)) ~> personupdt1
